tweet.text: During her May 1991 state visit, Queen Elizabeth presented Pres. George H.W. Bush four silver horseshoes engraved "EIIR.” In this photo, Pres. Bush demonstrates his horseshoe pitching abilities at the White House horseshoe pit: 📷 @Bush41Library (ID: P21732-15) https://t.co/IATbRGohWr
